DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess efficacy, safety, and convenience of purified human antibodies administered under the skin in the treatment of MMN patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Purified Human Antibodies Administered Subcutaneously to Patients With Multifocal Motor Neuropathy (MMN)
